website_summaries.verdict: These stylish cat nail caps are safe for cats, easy to apply, long-wearing, and comfortable.
pros: Pliable caps are tolerated well by most cats
Does a great job of staying put
Unless your cat is determined to bite them off, one application lasts 4 to 6 weeks
Each pack comes with 2 different colors so you can mix and match or keep things simple
cons: A bit pricier than others available

customer_reviews.title: stayed on for 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: These are a little difficult to put on. However once they are on correctly they stay on a good 3 weeks. I had a cat that was in a double cone due to licking and scratching, She could get under the cone and still scratch. These did help. My cat has been through a lot and usually is easy to work with. Unfortunately she freaked out when I tried messing with her back claws. I got a huge scratch which left a bruise. Next time I will put lavender oil on the pads of her paws first to calm her down.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi S.

customer_reviews.title: No!
customer_reviews.text: Wishing I never put these on my precious baby’s claws. One of her claws got so long that it’s pressing into her paw and she cries when I try and cut the tip of it off. Hoping the stupid claw cap will fall off soon enough.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative and great product overall
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s important to understand why you are getting these generally. Most people don’t want to declaw their cats. In a world of very limited options to preserve your stuff in your house and your cats claws at the same time, these are pretty good. Just a few small complaints: glue bottle is difficult to use after multiple uses. Easy to clog the funnel the glue takes. Sometimes the caps last well over a month, and sometimes a week if you’re lucky. It’s the nature of the beast. We just check weekly and it’s never been a huge problem. It all averages out to not be that bad to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Larry G.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my one year old cat. She started climbing up our patio screen now that the weather is warmer. Now she is unable to do so, and she isn't able to scratch us either. She licked her paws quite a bit at first, but has adjusted to the caps quickly and easily. She looks really cute with her pink nails. So far so good! The only thing was during application, it was difficult to tell how much glue you are putting in. I wasn't able to tell if any got in at times. But the caps are staying on, so I must have put just enough in.
customer_reviews.author: Julie J. Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother wasting your money.
customer_reviews.text: These did not stay one. I have used the cheap ones from EBay and decided to get these since they would get to me quicker. These popped off very quickly. Some the day after applying, a few lasted 2-3 days. Extremely overpriced for a product that doesn’t even last.
customer_reviews.author: BookLover89

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: Me again, Rizzy ...the cat (in case you don't know me). Initially I was a little hesitant to let my parents put these on me. But it was easy! It took but a second for them to give me a quick trim and them put these on. They don't bother me...the caps that is, not my parents....(although sometimes I wonder about them ). I walk just find with my new nails.... I enjoy manis more these days!
customer_reviews.author: Maria A Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Good but with a caveat.
customer_reviews.text: Keep an eye on your cat. If their nails don’t shed fast enough they can grow out and go into the pad just like an overgrown nail. I’m sure it wouldn’t have been a problem if we’d been paying more attention because we could have just trimmed. Maybe it’s an issue with older cats because their growing slower? Just don’t set and forget them. This is one of the few cases where it is not good if the product lasts longer than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: realvladiator

customer_reviews.title: Fake nails for cats
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and put them on my 2 y/o cat. I fed her one treat at a time and was able to apply 10 caps in about 5 mins. It would of been easier with 2 people , 2 I feel aren’t all the way on. Will def keep using these if they stay on. Right now all she is doing is licking her paws.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to apply alone.
customer_reviews.text: I like them but Vet applied them during anesthesia while being spayed. She chewed one back one and one front one off. I don’t think I can apply them alone I tried before Vet visit the glue made a mess while fussing with cat/kitten. I will keep trying because having her do quad is just very inhumane once I found out the procedure it’s horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought other brands before and they did not work. These are easier to apply! I will say using a cone around my cats head helped and it took two people to do. This is not a one person job. Great colors!
customer_reviews.author: PhilG

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using those for years and they do what they have to do... I need to keep an eye on her claws, because sometimes it never comes off and I need to cut it of to be able to trim her claws.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gonzalez Woiblet

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My cats already tried ripping them off and they are staying very well, they send enough glue for several rounds with these nails. Super cute, I got small for my girls. It did take two people, one hold the car and the other to slide on the nails. For the sake of your cats cut the nails the day prior so they aren't so mad. I bribed mine with tuna after so they hate me less.
customer_reviews.author: Angel McGaha

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult at first to figure out how much adhesive to put in the caps. To little they fall off, to much it overflows when applied. Definitely recommend getting the colored ones so you notice right away if one has fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: J Mahalak

customer_reviews.title: Hurts your cat
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PUT THESE ON YOUR CAT! THEY CAUSE THEM ALOT OF DISCOMFORT! They made my kittens nails grow back twisted and turned!
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and cats dont care.
customer_reviews.text: I just put them on my 2 cats. Super easy except had trouble getting glue out of tube. My cats are used to me clipping their claws so they didn't care at all and they are Bengals. We will see how long they last. They haven't even tried to get them off so they must not really feel them. Lol!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These are AMAZING! So easy to put on (I just had her eating some treats while I did it) they’ve stayed on with no issues, and she looks FABULOUS!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Same product, better price!
customer_reviews.text: I was SO excited to find these on amazon, because they retail for more than double at the pet store. These are the real deal, actually shaped like a nail, durable and awesome product to keep your kitty from scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: It works but
customer_reviews.text: It works but it's very hard to put on my cats. Also it fall out often while they are playing.
customer_reviews.author: Yuji

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: My kitten is very stubborn and doesn’t like her paws touched but I got them on and it was adorable! Stopped her from ruining my house without putting her through the pain of removing her nails
customer_reviews.author: Caseybeth Ley

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my kitty a few days ago, they're lasting so well, one broke in half (perhaps chewed off?) But my cat got used to them quickly and doesn't seem to mind too much. I'll update again when I have to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I just got this product in the mail today, and have applied these to my cat's nails. It was easy to apply, if you count my cat being a menace haha! My cat is almost a year old, and the smalls fit perfectly on her nails. The only thing that I would complain about this product, is for the price, there is not many nails in the pack. We will see how long they last!
customer_reviews.author: kennedy

customer_reviews.title: I was praying these would do the trick...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they caused my kitty pain or if she’s just stubborn. When putting them on, she had a potty accident and was completely terrified. She started pulling them off shortly thereafter.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Berrios

customer_reviews.title: Amazed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Great. So cute stylish and great protectors. Absolutely love them
customer_reviews.author: Tannaya Flores

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: They dried quickly, which is very nice with a cat who doesnt sit still. My cat is 5 month and the smalls fit perfectly. Only down side is, when she used the cat box her nails squeaked against the plastic
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Hadeen

customer_reviews.title: Need a ton of hands!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I tried to put these on our cat, so she would quit scratching our new couch. However we quickly realized we needed a 3rd person, 1 to hold the cat, one to apply glue into the caps and a 3rd to apply the caps to the cat quickly. Our cat still managed to get these off! She looked adorable with her pink nails, but it didnt last long.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Pinkham

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: They do there job. Dont plan on getting them off after you put them on. They will fall off on there own as the nails grow.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: They are so cute, but they have to be replaced regularly.
customer_reviews.author: matthew massey

customer_reviews.title: You will be glad you got them
customer_reviews.text: These are LIFE SAVING in my house. Both of our cats use them. It saves our skin and furniture. Well worth it and super easy to put on
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lynn Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Glue-Cause for..... paws
customer_reviews.text: Cool concept but quickly discovered that, my cat won't let me cut her nails (reason for purchase) no way she'll let me glue a piece of rubber/ plastic on them. I managed to get ONE on her, which she pulled off, along with a chunk of fur, in less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: WTFultz

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very durable and cute. Don’t wat your money on the pricier brand.
customer_reviews.author: Loren C.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value! We only do front claws so this worked for 2 full sets of each color. This kitten is keeping them on, so we have only used the pink so far!
customer_reviews.author: Kayden & Zane's Momma

customer_reviews.title: Would def recommend!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and my cat doesn’t mind them at all. Plus they’re adorable! I would definitely recommend. I was worried because I saw a comment about how the glue gave someone burns, but I got some on my hand/fingers and it was fine
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply. Need them to prevent cat from scratching ne furniture.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: I used these on my cat's front claws. They're easy to apply and work great. They stay on well, she even tried chewing them off and they do not come off until the nail grows out. We use them all the time now!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Easy on last forever
customer_reviews.text: These stay on till natural nail sheds easy to put on and last weeks before reply
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Poor
customer_reviews.text: Could not be used, threw away, dont waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Scrabblelady

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Easy to put on and the adhesive works really well! My cat bit on them non stop and they stayed on without any issues. Last about 3-4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These work very well. Very easy to apply. My cats dont even seem to notice they are wearing them. I've only replaced 2 in the last 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: AmberAmbie

customer_reviews.title: Cute kitty claw covers
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to apply. They've had them on for two days now and they're still on.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: These have saved our furniture! Easy to use. Plenty for 2 cats! These last us few months!
customer_reviews.author: Greens

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to save your furniture
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to put on. Thought it would bother the cats, but they don’t even notice.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My cats nearly killed me trying to put them on. But no more clawing things!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Super hard to put on. Came off within 10 minutes. Not worth the time, cat scratches or money.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Worked ok cat seemed able to get them off after a bit
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R.

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Best invention every. So easy to use and they really last.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Put the correct amount of glue!
customer_reviews.text: They worked really well we didn’t have to trim them and they slid right on.
customer_reviews.author: MD

product_meta.title: Kitty Caps Kitty Caps Nail Caps for Cats | Safe & Stylish Alternative to Declawing for Cats | Kitty Nail Caps Stop Snags and Scratches | Available in Multiple Sizes, Styles, and Colors
product_meta.description: Style:1 Pack| Size:Small| Color:Hot Purple & Hot PinkKeep your furniture protected from cat claws with these colorful cat nail covers. Kitty Caps for Cats provide a safe and humane alternative to surgical declawing and help prevent damage to furniture caused by your pet's natural desire to scratch. Kitty Caps are made from a safe and nontoxic natural vinyl resin. They're safe, easy to apply, and stop all snags and scratches. After application, your pet's claws can extend and retract without any disturbance. Kitty Caps will fall off as your cats nails grow and shed, generally 4-8 weeks after application. Package Contents: Each pack includes 40 Kitty Caps, 2 Adhesive Tubes, and 2 Application Tips. Sizing Guide: X-Small (XS): Cats under 5 lbs. Small (S): Cats 6-8 lbs. Medium (M): Cats 9-13 lbs. Large (L): Cats over 13 lbs. Application Instructions: STEP 1: Trim the tip of your cat's nails. Trim just enough to allow the nail cap to fit all the way to the base of the nail. STEP 2: Fill nail caps 1/3 full with adhesive. Gently squeeze the nail cap to evenly distribute the glue and release any air bubbles. If the glue oozes out of the nail cap, you have inserted too much adhesive. Remove some of the glue by squeezing it onto a paper towel. STEP 3: Extend nails by gently pressing thumb on top with index finger on bottom of paw -- slide nail caps onto nail. STEP 4: Observe cat for five minutes before release. You can play with your cat or feed some of kitty's favorite food to distract for a few minutes. YOUR SATISFACTION IS OUR PRIORITY- If you have any questions or feedback, please reach out to us directly at info@fetch4pets.com
feature_bullets: NO MORE CAT SCRATCHES — Cover your cat's nails with these cute multi-colored nail caps. No more cat scratches for you or your friends and family
